description: This file appears to be a React component module defining the root layout for a Remix-run based web application. It includes metadata, external resource links (like CSS and icons), and layout components such as HTML structure, head, body, and placeholders for nested routes.

methods.name: meta
methods.description: Generates metadata for the HTML head section, including the page title, description, theme color, Open Graph, and Twitter card info.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Provides an array of link tags for preconnecting to fonts and setting stylesheets and icons.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component defining the overall HTML layout, including head elements, body structure, and outlet for nested routes.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component that renders the Outlet for nested routing.
